aboutSenam.question: Where is Senam located?
aboutSenam.answer: Previously, Senam operated in multiple locations as a traditional bootcamp. However, we’ve transitioned into a specialized strength and conditioning space, which requires gym equipment. Currently, Senam is located at Wangsa Maju, and you can easily find us by searching 'SENAM HUB' on Waze. A second location in Cyberjaya is coming soon!

aboutSenam.question: When will Senam 2025 officially open?
aboutSenam.answer:
The new and improved Senam is gearing up to launch in early February 2025! We’re currently in the final stages of setting up equipment and preparing the space to deliver the ultimate strength and conditioning experience.
To celebrate the launch, we’re offering an exclusive pre-sale deal for early sign-ups. This limited-time offer gives you a chance to secure your spot at a significantly discounted rate before we officially open. Don’t miss out—be part of the first wave of participants to experience the new Senam!

aboutSenam.question: What membership options are available
aboutSenam.answer:
All our memberships are unlimited—train as much as you want! The minimum commitment is 2 months, but the membership is auto-renews monthly unless you opt to cancel at no cost after the initial term (2 months).
For those who prefer non-recurring options, we also offer:
- Walk-In Sessions
- 10x Visit Pass
- 1-Month Pass
Keep in mind that non-recurring packages have higher fees compared to our membership plans.

aboutSenam.question: How does the Senam program work?
aboutSenam.answer:
Our program follows a structured 8-week cycle consisting of 4 progressive phases:
- Week 1 & 2: Hypertrophy/Endurance
- Week 3 & 4: Strength/Endurance
- Week 5 & 6: Maximal Output
- Week 7 & 8: Deload
For more details, please refer to the page under the Training Club section.

aboutSenam.question: What happens if I join in the middle of the 8-week cycle?
aboutSenam.answer:
New joiners can seamlessly jump into the program at any point during the 8-week cycle. For example, if you join in Week 2 or even Week 7, you’ll slot into the sessions wherever the group is in the program.
Our elite trainers are equipped to guide you, ensuring you safely integrate into the workouts without risking injury. The program is designed to constantly cycle through the 4 phases, allowing long-term participation and continuous progress for all fitness levels.

membershipPolicy.question: What is the minimum membership commitment?
membershipPolicy.answer: All memberships require a minimum 2-month commitment. After the initial term, you can cancel at no cost before the next auto-renewal cycle.

membershipPolicy.question: How can I cancel my membership?
membershipPolicy.answer: You can cancel your membership anytime after completing the minimum 2-month commitment without providing notice or incurring any fees. If you wish to cancel within the 2-month commitment period, a MYR75 admin fee will apply.

membershipPolicy.question: What happens if I miss a class or can't attend?
membershipPolicy.answer: You can cancel your booking up to 2 hours before the session to avoid penalties. No-shows or late cancellations may result in a penalty fee or session deduction.

membershipPolicy.question: Can I pause my membership?
membershipPolicy.answer: Members may request a pause for up to 1 month due to valid reasons such as travel or medical issues. Written notice is required, and approval is subject to management's discretion.

membershipPolicy.question: What is the refund policy?
membershipPolicy.answer: Membership fees are non-refundable. However, a 7-day cooling-off period applies to new contracts. During this time, you may cancel in writing for a refund, minus a MYR75 admin fee and any costs incurred. No refunds are provided after the cooling-off period.

membershipPolicy.question: Can I transfer my membership to someone else?
membershipPolicy.answer: Membership transfers are not allowed, as they are tied to individual accounts.

membershipPolicy.question: How do I update my payment details?
membershipPolicy.answer: Payment details can be updated directly through the app or by contacting our support team.

membershipPolicy.question: What happens if my payment fails?
membershipPolicy.answer: If payment fails, you will be notified via email or app. Your membership access will be temporarily suspended until payment is completed.

membershipPolicy.question: What happens after the pre-sale period?
membershipPolicy.answer: After the pre-sale period, memberships will continue at the regular price of RM260/month with a 2-month commitment. Additionally, we will offer non-recurring packages, including walk-in sessions, visit pass sessions, and a 1-month pass for those who prefer more flexible options.
